back:
ul {list-style-type: disc;}

ul ul {list-style-type: circle;}

ul ul ul {list-style-type: square;}

content that is generated by the browser that is not represented by either the markup or the content.

example:

list markers are generated content

a[href]:before {content: \"(link)\";}

- precede every hyperlink with the text '(link)'

 

a.pdf-doc:after {content: url(pdf-doc-icon.png);}

- insert a small icon at the end of links to PDF documents

list[type=\"ordered\"] {counter-reset: ordered;}

list[type=\"ordered\"] item {display: block;}

list[type=\"ordered\"] item:before {counter-increment: ordered; content: counter(ordered) \". \"; margin: 0.25em 0;}
